mean_cn: adj. 固执的，冷酷无情的
mean_en: refusing to do what other people want :not willing to change your opinion or the way you do something
word_etyma: ob逆，倒，加强意义+dur持久，坚硬+ate形容词后缀→坚持反对→顽固的，执拗的
sentence: She is very obdurate, even when I try to help her, she is still not willing to listen.
sentence_trans: 她非常固执，即使我想帮她，她也不愿意听。
